channel.title: Advanced Editor on Vanilla Forums Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Advanced Editor on Vanilla Forums Documentation

item.title: Additional Settings
item.description: Advanced settings Advanced Editor has different modes to help you accommodate the needs of your community. By default, all forums are set to use Markdown as their post format. Wysiwyg WYSIWYG stands for “What you see is what you get”. It is a familiar and intuitive format for most end users. In this mode, pictures and text formatting will display in the editor as the user composes their post, eliminating the need for them to understand formatting tags.
